name: Tik VPN - Free VPN, fast access, unlimited traffic
description: Tik VPN provides a permanent free VPN line that can access global sites at any time, including blocked sites.   Want fast and stable access to global sites? Use Tik VPN!  Want unlimited VPN traffic for wathing videos? Use Tik VPN!  Want to use quality VPN services for free forever? Use Tik VPN!  Want to use a more stable and faster VIP VPN line for free? Use Tik VPN!  Multiple high-quality VPN servers around the world allow you to access any website for free and stable anytime, anywhere.  Free high-speed and stable VPN  1. Regular free VPN line: Unlimited connections, unlimited traffic, completely free;  2. High-speed VIP VPN line: (1) The high-speed VPN service for VIP users has double speed and lower latency; (2) Ordinary users can also get VIP usage time for free and experience VIP services;  3. Visible VPN connection speed: Display the upload and download speed of the current VPN service, if you are not satisfied, you can switch at any time;  4. VPN line intelligent connection, arbitrary switching: (1) Smart connection service can automatically connect to the fastest VPN server to provide better VPN service; (2) Through the server list, you can also manually switch to the target server;  5. Manage applications that use VPN services: (1) Select the application that needs VPN service and access its service through VPN; (2) Remove applications that do not require VPN services and do not affect their normal use;  6. Hide the local IP address, protect your device and privacy: (1) Protect your security and privacy in an open network environment; (2) Prevent websites or other applications from tracking your IP;
